name: Smoochum
author: Kagemaru Himeno

attacks.name: Energy Kiss
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

rule_box: If your Active Pokémon is a Baby Pokémon and your opponent announces an attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends.
